    • Method Detail

      • cluster

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<double[]>> cluster(java.util.ArrayList<double[]> points,
                                                                         java.util.ArrayList<double[]> circles,
                                                                         double minGap)
        Performs the clustering, given an array of points. minGap tells the cluster the minimum distance between two points in order to belong to different clusters. minGap is expressed in the points coordinate system (especially not meters, if coordinates are degrees). If the caller passes an empty list circles, for each cluster an enclosing circle is stores ([0]/[1]: center, [2] radius).
        Parameters:
        points - the input points (note, this array is destroyed on execution)
        circles - the enclosing circles for each cluster
        minGap - the minimum distance between two clusters
        Returns:
        the set of clusters, each cluster contains a list of points. Every input point is copied to exactly one cluster.
